document_data.mainbody:
Keptus Hunzrin was the House Weapon Master of House Hunzrin, one of the ruling drow Houses of Menzoberranzan in the Northdark in the late 15 century DR.
Xeva was a drow male with obsidian black skin and red color eyes â€“ the only part of his face not hidden behind a mask. His hair was long and snow-white.
Keptus Hunzrin was a cousin of Matron Mother Shakti Hunzrin and the 15 century DR master of Melee-Magthere, Syrdaun Hunzrin. Syrdauns relationship with Keptus allowed the master of Melee-Magthere to lobby with Matron Mother for attacking lower and weaker Houses of Menzoberranzan.
Keptus Hunzrin claimed the title of the House Weapon Master sometime during or before the rule of Matron Mother Shakti Hunzrin that began in .
